SEEALSO: SpreadsheetAddColumn, SpreadsheetAddImage, SpreadsheetAddRow, SpreadsheetDeleteRow, SpreadsheetDeleteRows, SpreadsheetFormatRow, SpreadsheetFormatRows, SpreadsheetShiftRows
DESCRIPTION: Reads and stores content from a spreadsheet object and returns it as a byte array.
EXAMPLE:
<cfheader name="Content-Disposition" value="inline; filename=test.xls"> 
<cfset a = spreadhsheetnew()> 
<cfset spreadsheetAddRow(a,"a,b,c")> 
<!---You can do all the processing---> 
<cfset bin = spreadsheetReadBinary(a)> 
<cfcontent type="application/vnd-ms.excel" variable="#bin#" reset="true">

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: The Excel spreadsheet object to read.
